Module: plugin

Methods

(inner) contextmenu(optionsopt, cancelopt, sensitivityopt, waitopt)

A cross-device context menu implementation for video.js players.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
options Object <optional>
 {}
cancel Boolean <optional>
 true

Whether or not to cancel the native "contextmenu" event when it is seen.
sensitivity Number <optional>
 10

The maximum number of pixels a finger can move because a touch is no longer considered to be "held".
wait Number <optional>
 500

The minimum number of milliseconds a touch must be "held" before it registers.
